price: 29. Mokonzi ya mwasi alobi: Eh bankumu! Babwakeli ngai mokanda ya lokumu.
arabic: قَالَتۡ يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلۡمَلَؤُاْ إِنِّيٓ أُلۡقِيَ إِلَيَّ كِتَٰبٞ كَرِيمٌ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: qālat yāayyuhā al-mala-u innī ul'qiya ilayya kitābun karīmun
